EmailTemplate.description: TX Compass Introduction w/ J. Rene Walker as BoR - 2nd Follow Up
EmailTemplate.name: TX Compass Introduction w/ J. Rene Walker as BoR - 2nd Follow Up
EmailTemplate.subject: Following Up: MLS Introduction
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
Hope your week is going great! I wanted to follow up on the previous email. Please note Compass requires their agents to complete the IDX request form before your broker of record can sign the form.
Let me know if you have any questions, I am happy to help!
Best Regards,
